creditline: Gift of Howard and Dorothy Pramann from the Mrs. M.J. McKelvy Estate, St. Cloud, MN
description: woman seated on a bench, wearing a pale green kimono, blue obi and geta sandals, holding a small smoking pipe; young girl at right wearing yellow and brown striped kimono, grey and blue jacket and red obi, holds a tray with teapot and cup; backdrop with mountain and landscape behind figures
inscription:
Inscription

LRC, in negative: [B 1089 ROAD-SIDE TEA HOUSE.]; LLQ, below bench, in white (in negative): [1089]
title: Road-side Tea House, from a photography album with images of Japan
